dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 9345 IH: Improving SBA Engagement on Employee Ownership Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Phillips (for himself and Ms. Velázquez) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To direct the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to improve outreach and education on employee ownership, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Improving SBA Engagement on Employee Ownership Act.

section.header: Amendment to small business investment company program outreach
section.text: Section 862(c) of the John S. McCain National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2019 (Public Law 115–232; 15 U.S.C. 648 note) is amended by inserting , and to the investors and limited partners of such companies, before to increase.
Section 7(a)(35) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 636(35)) is amended by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: The Administrator (or a designee or official thereof) shall attend working groups, meetings, fora, and any other engagements hosted by any other Federal agency or office to which the Administrator (or designees or officials thereof) is invited, or with which the Administrator (or a designee or official thereof) has had a previous engagement or relationship, with respect to cooperatives or employee ownership of business concerns.
